nodes.title: Village Life Before Chaos
nodes.summary: Establish protagonist's childhood environment in rural India — normal life, small pleasures, early signs of detachment.
nodes.ux_notes: Poster image + swipeable gallery; small ambient audio loop (birds).

nodes.title: Attack on Village
nodes.summary: Sudden attack destroys the safe world — protagonist hides, flees; trauma seeds hopelessness.
nodes.ux_notes: Short 6–8s animated clip, black/red color grading; 'reveal' hotspot to show the burnt letter.

nodes.title: Escape and Survival
nodes.summary: Protagonist alone in wilderness, learns self-reliance; forges physical skills that make him useful later.

interactive_elements.label: Escape Route
interactive_elements.description: User drags a marker to reveal sequential beats

nodes.ux_notes: Interactive map showing escape path; collectable used as recurring motif in dossier.

nodes.title: College Arrival
nodes.summary: Protagonist arrives at university; meets male friend and female friend — beginnings of the core circle.
nodes.ux_notes: Character cards with photos & short bios; quick toggle to view relationship graph.

nodes.title: College Romance Scenes
nodes.summary: Tender moments between protagonist and female friend; establishes emotional stake and later guilt.
nodes.ux_notes: Hover-to-unredact microinteraction; include a short, loopable ambient track.

nodes.title: War Recruitment Call
nodes.summary: The country calls young males; protagonist and male friend enlist because of prior training.
nodes.ux_notes: Animated poster that folds open to reveal the recruitment notice.

nodes.title: First Combat Mission
nodes.summary: First major battlefield sequence where brotherhood is cemented; protagonist shows competence under fire.
nodes.ux_notes: 8–12s montage; allow POV toggle switching between two short versions for contrast.

nodes.title: Male Friend's Sacrifice
nodes.summary: Male friend sacrifices himself saving others; this trauma drives protagonist's lifelong vengeance.
nodes.ux_notes: Display memorial card; update global 'vengeance score' for the protagonist (affects later hints).

nodes.title: RAW Recruitment Offer
nodes.summary: Secret RAW program offers the protagonist a chance to erase identity in exchange for covert service.

interactive_elements.label: Opt-In
interactive_elements.description: User can read the sealed terms

nodes.ux_notes: Make the briefing look stamped 'TOP SECRET' with animated redaction bars.

nodes.title: Training Montage (RAW)
nodes.summary: Intense training sequences sharpen protagonist's skills; he earns the American marshal's respect earlier in offscreen events.
nodes.ux_notes: Montage segmented into 3 hotspots: combat, stealth, cyber.

nodes.title: Middle East Mission Briefing
nodes.summary: Protagonist briefed for covert operations in Iran/Iraq/Syria to root out corruption networks.
nodes.ux_notes: Interactive map with pins that open dossier modals; pin 'roots' get special redaction overlay.

nodes.title: Execution of Covert Mission
nodes.summary: Desert ops and sabotage missions to dismantle the 'roots' financing the war and corruption.
nodes.ux_notes: Collect 'Root Fragment' which later links to the Indian officer's destabilized deal.

nodes.title: Betrayal / Ambush
nodes.summary: A betrayal exposes that powerful political actors sold out criminal elements leading to instability.
nodes.ux_notes: Use reveal-on-hover for parts of the leaked cable; mark the destabilized deal for officer node.

nodes.title: American Marshal Introduction (Backstory)
nodes.summary: Flashback: protagonist impressed an American marshal during training wars; marshal becomes a future ally.
nodes.ux_notes: Short audio clip of marshal complimenting protagonist; add 'favor owed' flag in dossier.

nodes.title: Protagonist Moves Rogue in America
nodes.summary: Protagonist signals rogue intentions; on paper he becomes a bargaining chip for nations.
nodes.ux_notes: Show a red 'no-record' stamp on his file; add hint that America plans a capture.

nodes.title: Capture by US Government
nodes.summary: He is captured and taken to a secure prison; seen as diplomatic leverage by the presidency.
nodes.ux_notes: CCTV modal with grain filter; provide a 'scrub timeline' UI to show intake sequence.

nodes.title: Mafia Extradition Incarceration
nodes.summary: An Indian mafia boss is also imprisoned in the same facility; he notices the protagonist's anomaly.
nodes.ux_notes: Show the scratched Nokia image as an evidence file with interactive numbers (hover reveals metadata).

nodes.title: Initial Prison Observation
nodes.summary: Power dynamics in prison; protagonist blends in while being watched by mafia.
nodes.ux_notes: Provide small heatmap overlay for guard movement; allow switching POV to see different data.

nodes.title: Prison Riot / Strength Test
nodes.summary: Weekly rituals escalate into a riot; protagonist demonstrates his skill, attracting mafia attention.

interactive_elements.label: Who Survives?
interactive_elements.description: User sees outcomes of riot participants

nodes.ux_notes: Interactive 'who survives' card gives small lore rewards; soundscape of riot is loopable.

nodes.title: Information Exchange with Mafia
nodes.summary: Mafia offers a deal — freedom in exchange for favor; protagonist extracts key intelligence he needs.
nodes.ux_notes: Redacted transcript can be gradually revealed as the player collects evidence in other nodes.

nodes.title: Legal Bail / Illusion of Freedom
nodes.summary: A staged legal 'bail' (₹80 lacs) is manufactured to extract protagonist and mafia boss — an official illusion.
nodes.ux_notes: Make '80' an interactive motif; clicking it shows all occurrences across dossiers.

nodes.title: Flight to Unknown Location
nodes.summary: They leave India under cover; RAW catches airport CCTV later — cliffhanger destination unknown.
nodes.ux_notes: Partial manifest opens only after other nodes are discovered (gamified reveal).

nodes.title: Middle East Destabilization
nodes.summary: Protagonist dismantles the 'roots' in Iran/Iraq/Syria that funded the war and corrupt deals.
nodes.ux_notes: Click destroyed nodes to see short before/after stills; mark link to the Indian officer's destabilized deal.

nodes.title: Global Laying Low
nodes.summary: After missions he lies low, reflecting that vengeance didn't bring peace; he remembers the female friend.
nodes.ux_notes: Enable a 'journal' that reveals small personal lines from protagonist to humanize him.

nodes.title: Female Friend’s Career Rise
nodes.summary: Believing him dead, she studies behavioral science and climbs into global gov work; becomes a tracker.
nodes.ux_notes: Interactive timeline of her promotions; clicking entries opens case samples she worked on.

nodes.title: London Assignment & Officer's Discovery
nodes.summary: Indian officer notices her college tie and subtly tries to funnel the hunt through her without revealing the target.
nodes.ux_notes: Show a branching UI that displays why officer thinks she is a useful vector.

nodes.title: Yacht Party Setup
nodes.summary: A diplomatic yacht event is staged as a test/trap; female friend is invited; the yacht is sabotaged.

interactive_elements.label: Yacht Layout
interactive_elements.description: Click basement/ deck/bridge to view micro-events

nodes.ux_notes: Interactive yacht cutaway; hotspots reveal small audio cues and evidence.

nodes.title: Yacht Sabotage & Ambush
nodes.summary: Goons prepare in basement (Plan B) as the intended sabotage (Plan A) unfolds above deck.
nodes.ux_notes: Basement log includes a tip-in from the protagonist's helper revealing the ambush.

nodes.title: Protagonist Intervenes (Yacht)
nodes.summary: He infiltrates the basement, neutralizes the captain and goons, saves female friend, then jumps into the river unseen.
nodes.ux_notes: Provide three short POV clips; female friend's POV should be ambiguous (hallucination vs real).

nodes.title: Officer Tightens the Noose
nodes.summary: Plan A and B fail; officer realizes some hidden agent intervened; builds suspicion about hidden protector.
nodes.ux_notes: Mark 'suspicion' on global dossier — increases narrative tension.

nodes.title: Protagonist Plans London Breakout
nodes.summary: Knowing officer's impatience, he plans a full assault on the agency to extract female friend and fake their deaths.
nodes.ux_notes: Allow users to open each step for a short visual storyboard.

nodes.title: Silent Entry
nodes.summary: Initial stealth infiltration, neutralizing outer guards and disabling cameras.
nodes.ux_notes: CCTV map UI with nodes that flicker when protagonist disables them.

nodes.title: Chaotic Inner Assault
nodes.summary: Stealth gives way to open fighting as inner layers resist; protagonist fights through corridors.
nodes.ux_notes: Heatmap updates dynamically as user explores the timeline scrub.

nodes.title: Confrontation with Female Friend
nodes.summary: He reaches her; she sees him alive, points a gun; confusion, disbelief and emotional tension.
nodes.ux_notes: POV swap is key — the officer's CCTV angle reveals his later decision; keep female view ambiguous.

nodes.title: Trust Test & Gun to Forehead
nodes.summary: Protagonist disarms the moment by pressing the gun to his own forehead and moving her to the wall.
nodes.ux_notes: This micro-cut should be available as a slow-motion clip for dramatic replay.

nodes.title: Officer Watches & Cuts Signal
nodes.summary: Watching CCTV, the officer contemplates detonation; protagonist preemptively cuts connections and remote detonation control.
nodes.ux_notes: Enable split-screen: Officer control UI + live CCTV; toggling shows timeline differences.

nodes.title: Building Detonation & Illusion of Death
nodes.summary: Protagonist detonates the building remotely after exiting; world believes both died in blast.
nodes.ux_notes: Blast sequence should be cinematic, then cut to global news montage for credibility.

nodes.title: Aftermath & Global Reaction
nodes.summary: Agencies scramble; Indian officer frustrated; press covers the blast and 'deaths'.
nodes.ux_notes: News archive with clickable headlines that open transcripts and redactions.

nodes.title: Shadow Flight — Cliffhanger
nodes.summary: Protagonist and female friend disappear on a covert flight; destination is unknown and left as a cliffhanger.
nodes.ux_notes: Final node — leave several 'destination' options locked until later chapters; make '80' motif visible if collected.

global_components.name: Master Timeline
global_components.description: Horizontal scrubbable timeline that highlights nodes visited and motif occurrences (e.g., '80').

global_components.name: Dossier Sidebar
global_components.description: Persistent drawer showing collected evidence, character cards, and POV toggles.

global_components.name: POV Toggle
global_components.description: When enabled, swaps narrative copy & available evidence to match selected perspective (Protagonist/Female/Officer).

interaction_principles: Reveal slowly — redacted items become readable as users unlock related nodes.
Cross-link everywhere — evidence items should link to all nodes where they appear (e.g., '80' shows occurrences).
Keep ambiguity — near-miss events should remain ambiguous until multiple corroborations are found.
Collectables & motifs (e.g., '80', Nokia list, Torn Photo) should be visible in sidebar and link back to scene nodes.
performance_notes: Load heavy assets (video) on demand; use placeholders for thumbnails.
Use progressive reveal for video: poster -> muted short clip -> full clip on demand.
Cache character visuals (Nano Banana outputs) to maintain consistency across nodes.
